about.title: About
about.subtitle: Learn more about the project, its purpose, and the team behind it.
about.whatIsDescription: Campus forum and course review community
about.whatIsContent: project-consensus is a campus forum and course review community designed by Frank Yang and Jim Yang. It aims to help students share insights, discuss courses, and build a collaborative community.
about.repositoryDescription: Explore the source code and contribute
about.repositoryContent: The project is open-source. Check out the repository and feel free to open issues or submit pull requests.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.desc: Sorry, the page you're looking for doesn't exist or may have been moved. Please check the URL or return to the homepage to continue browsing.
notFound.quickActionsDesc: Use the navigation to find features or pages
notFound.goHomeDesc: Start a new journey from the home page

tos.title: Terms of Service
tos.intro: By using this site you agree to the following terms.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By creating an account or using project-consensus, you agree to these Terms and all applicable policies referenced here.

accounts.title: 2. Accounts and Eligibility
accounts.content: You must provide accurate information and keep your account secure. You are responsible for all activity under your account.

userContent.title: 3. User Content
userContent.content: You retain ownership of content you post. By posting, you grant us a non-exclusive license to host, store, display, and distribute your content as necessary to operate the service.

prohibited.title: 4. Prohibited Conduct
items: Illegal, harassing, hateful, or violent behavior
Infringing intellectual property or privacy rights
Circumventing security or abusing the service

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All trademarks, logos, and software of project-consensus are protected. Do not use them without prior permission.

disclaimer.title: 6. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The service is provided “as is” without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee accuracy, availability, or reliability.

limitation.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, project-consensus will not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.

privacy.title: 8. Privacy Policy
privacy.content: We collect only what is necessary to operate the service (e.g., account info and content you submit). We do not sell your personal data and do not share it except as needed to comply with law.

changes.title: 9. Changes to these Terms
changes.content: We may update these Terms from time to time. Material changes will be announced by notice on the site. Continued use constitutes acceptance.

settings.title: User Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your profile, password, and privacy preferences.

profile.title: Profile
profile.desc: Update your display name and avatar.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.desc: Control how others can see and contact you.

showEmail.title: Show email on profile
showEmail.desc: Allow others to see your email on your profile.

allowDMs.title: Allow direct messages
allowDMs.desc: Allow others to send you private messages.

showOnlineStatus.title: Show online status
showOnlineStatus.desc: Let others see when you're online.

language.title: Preferred Language
language.hint: Changes apply immediately for this device.
